main event: A UFO sighting on October 14, 1956, observed from Batavia, Ohio, where witnesses described a bright metallic object traveling at high speeds and making sharp turns.
interesting points: The object was seen by multiple witnesses who reported it was trailing a flame,The object's movement was described as a smooth turn without leaving a trail,It was visible for only a few seconds before it disappeared from sight,Similar sightings occurred in nearby locations at the same time,One witness mentioned the object appeared stationary for a minute before accelerating rapidly.
sighted object: bright metallic object with a tail of flame
witness description: Various civilians, some with an interest in astronomy, and others driving in the area.
